static Type kTypeDataBits
 In order for an derived type to be considered a valid data attribute the first byte of its type id must be these bits.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

OMI_API_GLOBAL omi::DataAttribute::DataAttribute ( )

Constructs a new null attribute.

Note
This attribute is immutable by definition.
OMI_API_GLOBAL omi::DataAttribute::DataAttribute ( const Attribute &  other)

Constructs a new reference count of the given Attribute.

If the given attribute is not a valid data attribute this construct an invalid DataAttribute.

Exceptions
arc::ex::StateErrorIf this attribute is not valid.
arc::ex::IllegalActionErrorIf this attribute is immutable.
